name: sicop-backend
description: SICOP Backend - Microservices with Shared Database

scripts.db:reset: npx prisma db push --force-reset --schema=./prisma/schema.prisma && npm run db:seed
scripts.setup:db: npm install && npm run db:generate && npm run db:push && npm run db:seed
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:auth && npm run install:student && npm run install:document
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:auth" "npm run dev:student" "npm run dev:document"
scripts.build:all: npm run build:auth && npm run build:student && npm run build:document
scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm run start:auth" "npm run start:student" "npm run start:document"
scripts.docker:reset: docker-compose down -v && docker volume rm back_sicop_main_data || true
